# Go Web 编程

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/go-web-biancheng
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/go-web-biancheng
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install go-web-biancheng
go-web-biancheng <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g go-web-biancheng
go-web-biancheng <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
